Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People on social media have been vocalizing their opinions ahead of the upcoming Australian Federal Budget. Some users have commended the Women's Economic Equality Taskforceâ€™s recommendations to support single mothers young parents and families. Meanwhile others have emphasized concerns over the fiscal irresponsibility of the Stage 3 tax cuts that may cost the budget more than $240 billion over the next ten years. Some people have also criticized the Reserve Bank of Australia for perceived credibility issues. With a $1 trillion Govt debt everyone is keeping a close eye on Budget 2023.
